original_text: He shall bathe himself with water in the sanctuary area and put on his regular garments. Then he shall come out and sacrifice the burnt offering for himself and the burnt offering for the people, to make atonement for himself and for the people.
korean_text: 거룩한 곳에서 물로 그의 몸을 씻고 자기 옷을 입고 나와서 자기의 번제와 백성의 번제를 드려 자기와 백성을 위하여 속죄하고

sentences.original_text: He shall bathe himself with water
and put on his regular garments
and sacrifice the burnt offering for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신을 위한 번제물을 드릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: and the burnt offering for the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 백성을 위한 번제물을 드릴 것이다
그리고 백성을 위한 속죄를 하기 위해
